hero.titlePrefix: A coach you can talk to.
hero.titleHighlight: Not a dashboard you have to figure out.
hero.subtitle: YOUB knows your data, but also your daily life. Training is created through dialogue – together with you.

chat.title: Analytics Chat
chat.user1: I feel tired, but intervals are on the schedule.
chat.ai1: Your feeling matches your data. Today is a full day – let's adjust the training.
chat.ai2: Tomorrow has more space. Then we'll tackle the intervals.

problem.title: Your training competes with your daily life.
problem.subtitle: You want to reach your goal. But between work, family, and daily life, there's often no time to analyze training data and constantly make new decisions.

pillar1.title: Lack of Time
pillar1.text: You want to train effectively. But not plan, evaluate, and question everything every single day.

pillar2.title: Mental Overload
pillar2.text: Too many decisions. Too many numbers. Too little clarity.

pillar3.title: Rigid Plans
pillar3.text: Plans expect perfect weeks. Your daily life isn't like that.

solution.title: More than a Plan. An intelligent nervous system for your performance.

block1.title: Real-time Adaptivity
block1.text: YOUB doesn't just stubbornly plan ahead. Our AI continuously analyzes your data from Garmin, HRV and sleep. When your body needs rest, YOUB detects it before you slip into overtraining. We replace static plans with dynamic intelligence.

block2.title: A Coach That Speaks to You
block2.text: Don't feel like navigating complex dashboards? YOUB proactively reaches out to you – via WhatsApp or app. Like a real trainer, YOUB gives you feedback, motivates you, or slows you down when necessary. Simple, human, direct.

block3.title: Science Instead of a Black Box
block3.text:
Behind every recommendation is a clear decision-making path, built on sports science and the rules used by sports scientists and doctors in practice.
We use AI to make this decision path understandable, conversational, and suitable for everyday use not to generate training plans in a black box.

mockChat.msg1: Hey, how was the ride just now?
mockChat.msg3:
Alright.
Then it was exactly the right choice today.

magicMoment.line3: Instead a dialogue that creates clarity.

trust.text: YOUB combines athletic experience with scientific methodology. Built by athletes, developed with data – for decisions that work in everyday life.

forYou.title: For You
forYou.subtitle: YOUB is for you if:
forYou.item1: you are a triathlete, cyclist, or runner
forYou.item2: you train performance-oriented and pursue clear goals
forYou.item3: you already collect training data and want to understand more from it
forYou.item4: you are ready to trust your training process

notForYou.title: Not right now
notForYou.subtitle: YOUB is currently not for you if:
notForYou.item1: you are just starting with endurance training
notForYou.item2: you don't use training data or wearables
notForYou.item3: you consciously want to train without structure

waitlist.title: Secure your spot in the first beta.
waitlist.subtitle: We are starting with a limited beta phase. Sign up and get access as soon as a spot becomes available.
waitlist.microcopy: No credit card required. GDPR compliant. Notification when a spot is available.

success.title: Almost there!
success.message: We've sent you a confirmation email. Please check your inbox (and spam folder if necessary).

seo.title: YOUB - Training That Adapts to Your Life
seo.description: YOUB is your intelligent AI coach for triathlon, cycling, and running. We combine sports science with real-time data analysis for your optimal training.

hero.title: YOUB is Chat-first Coaching
hero.subtitle:
No cluttered dashboard. No endless charts.
YOUB communicates with you the way real coaching works: through conversation.
hero.micro: Because understanding is more important than evaluating.

why.title: Why Chat-first?
why.text:
Good coaching doesn't happen in diagrams. It happens in the exchange: after a session, in daily life, at the right moment.
YOUB focuses on communication instead of control – and accompanies your training through dialogue.
why.note: No buzzwords. No AI. No tech.

examples.title: How it feels
examples.subtitle: Everyday examples
examples.msg1: Hey, how was your ride just now?
examples.msg2: Looks like you nailed it – strong work.
examples.msg3: Take it easy today. Your body needs it.

principle.title: Behind every dialogue is a decision path
principle.subtitle: Developed together with sport scientists and doctors from sports science and real coaching practice

anti.title: What YOUB is consciously not
anti.closing: YOUB focuses on orientation through dialogue, not control through data.

cta.text: YOUB accompanies you through dialogue – adapted to your life, not to a plan.

feeling.title: Coaching is a Conversation
feeling.text1:
Good coaching doesn't happen in diagrams.
It happens in the exchange – after training, in daily life, at the right moment.
feeling.text2:
YOUB accompanies you exactly there:
in conversation, not in the dashboard.

chat.msg1: Hey, how was the ride just now?
chat.msg2: Pretty good, legs were a bit heavy at the start.
chat.msg3:
Looked like solid work.
Take it easy tomorrow – your body is currently absorbing a lot of training effect.

hero.title: Training for real life. Not for the lab.
hero.subtitle: We believe a training plan must adapt to the person – not the other way around. YOUB is the answer to the question: How can we stay ambitious without burning out?

principles.title: Your body is not an Excel spreadsheet.
principles.subtitle: Conventional training plans assume every day is perfect. That you always sleep 8 hours, have no stress at work and never get sick. But that's not reality. That's lab theory.

item1.title: Life is dynamic.
item1.text: A rigid plan that ignores stress doesn't lead to personal bests. It leads to injuries.

item2.title: Context is everything.
item2.text: 300 watts feel different after a meeting marathon than they do on vacation. Your training needs to know that.

item3.title: Consistency beats heroism.
item3.text: It's not about giving it your all once. It's about being able to train again tomorrow.

story.headline: The Vision: Everyone deserves a mentor.
story.p1: I was lucky. I had something most athletes lack: A coach who didn't just write training plans, but who was truly there. A sparring partner who is now the sports science intelligence behind YOUB.
story.p2: We exchanged ideas every day. When I was tired, it wasn't "push through," but "rest." When I had doubts, this expertise gave me security. I never had to decide alone whether a twitch in my leg was serious or whether interval training still made sense despite stress at work. We decided together.
story.p3: This feeling – the absolute security that someone is thinking along and looking out for me – increased my performance more than any rigid training plan before.
story.p4: But I realized: A human being cannot divide themselves. Only a few athletes have the privilege or the budget for such close 1:1 support. I wanted to change that.
story.p5: I founded YOUB to make this individual support accessible to everyone. We have translated this logic, empathy, and sound knowledge into an AI. So that you have exactly this daily consultation and this security – 24/7, right in your pocket.
story.p6: YOUB is the attempt to share this privilege with the world.

team.title: Who we are
team.headline: More than just an app – a team of experts.
team.connection: At YOUB, we are the connection of two worlds:

world1.label: The Athletes & Coaches
world1.text: Who know how real training feels and what questions an athlete truly has.

world2.label: The Visionaries & Engineers
world2.text: Who translate this human experience into intelligent, adaptive technology.

team.shared_goal: Together we have one goal: To bring the knowledge of the best from our Sports Lab directly into your pocket.

item1.title: Intelligence over toughness
item1.text: We believe the smartest athlete wins, not the one who burns out the fastest.

item2.title: Context is King
item2.text: A wattage value means nothing if we don't know how you slept. We see the whole picture.

item3.title: Long-term focus
item3.text: We don't optimize for the next segment on Strava, but for your health and performance in 5 years.

isOnlyApp.question: Is YOUB just another training plan app?
isOnlyApp.answer: No. YOUB is an Everyday Training Intelligence. While apps just run through plans, YOUB adapts your training daily to your real stress levels, your sleep, and your feedback – just like a human coach (our "Markus Principle").

dataUsage.question: Will my data be used for AI development?
dataUsage.answer: No, your feedback supports us in developing YOUB as a product, but we do not train an AI model with your data. Data protection and transparency are our top priorities.

devices.question: Which devices are supported?
devices.answer: In the current beta phase, we are focusing on seamless Garmin integration. Suunto, Whoop, Wahoo, Zwift, Rouvy, and Apple Health are coming soon.

manualUpload.question: Do I have to upload my data manually?
manualUpload.answer: No. Once your account is connected, your data flows automatically to YOUB. Communication and feedback happen conveniently via WhatsApp or the web interface.

free.question: Is participating in the beta free?
free.answer: Yes. As a thank you for your feedback, use during the beta phase is completely free.

afterBeta.question: What happens to my account after the beta phase?
afterBeta.answer: You keep your "Early Bird" status. We guarantee you a lifelong special price (Founder Offer) when YOUB officially launches.

feedbackAmount.question: How much feedback do I need to give?
feedbackAmount.answer: As much as you like; every bit of feedback helps us make YOUB a little better. As a beta tester, you have a direct communication channel to the YOUB team.

overtraining.question: Can the AI lead me into overtraining?
overtraining.answer: That's exactly what we prevent. Markus' logic (sports science background) is programmed to counter immediately at signs of overload. YOUB is "Safety First." However, that doesn't mean a session is skipped immediately; we try to intelligently adjust training and intensities.

wrongSuggestion.question: What should I do if the AI makes a suggestion that feels wrong?
wrongSuggestion.answer: Your body's intuition always beats the AI. You can tell the system at any time: "I don't feel good today," and YOUB will adjust the plan immediately.

howToFeedback.question: How can I give feedback or report bugs?
howToFeedback.answer: During the beta phase, you have a direct line to us. You can reach us anytime via WhatsApp or by email at feedback{'@'}youb.app. Your input flows directly into further development.

voiceMessages.question: Can I also send voice messages?
voiceMessages.answer: Yes, absolutely! We love voice messages because they often best describe how your training felt. Our AI understands the context of your message.

founderQuote.text: Do you have a question that isn't listed here? Write to us directly. During the beta phase, you have a direct line to the team.
founderQuote.author: Felix Hermanutz — Founder

analysis.title: Analyze Activity
analysis.subtitle: Upload your .fit file and discuss the analysis with YOUB AI.

upload.drop: Drop file here or click to select

chat.placeholder: Ask about climbs, NP, or intensity...
chat.welcome: File analyzed successfully! What would you like to know about your workout?

legalNotice.tradeRegulationsText: (Legal Information System of the Republic of Austria)

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: At YOUB, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and safeguard your information when you use our health app.

section1.title: 1. Identity and Contact Details of the Data Controller
section1.content: The data controller for your personal data is Felix Hermanutz, operating as a sole proprietor. If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or your personal data, please contact us at:

section2.title: 2. Purpose of Data Processing
section2.content: YOUB processes your personal data (including health-related data) to provide personalized training and health insights. This includes analyzing metrics such as heart rate, sleep patterns, activity levels, and recovery indicators obtained from third-party wearable platforms, and combining them with your training plan and schedule to support training recommendations and planning.

section3.title: 3. Legal Bases for Processing
section3.content: We process your personal data based on the following legal grounds:
section3.item1: Article 6(1)(a) GDPR: Your explicit consent to process personal data for the purpose of providing personalized health insights and training planning features.
section3.item2: Article 9(2)(a) GDPR: Your explicit consent to process special categories of personal data, including health data.

section4.title: 4. Source and Categories of Personal Data
section4.content: We collect the following categories of personal data from third-party wearable platforms such as Garmin, Whoop, and Suunto (depending on what you connect and authorize):
items: Other health-related metrics provided by connected platforms

section5.title: 5. Google User Data (Google Calendar Integration – Full Scope)
section5.content: YOUB integrates with Google Calendar to support training planning and schedule synchronization. We use full calendar access (Google Calendar full scope) to provide the requested functionality. In compliance with the Google API Services User Data Policy, we are transparent about how we access, use, store, and share Google user data.

sub1.title: 5.1 Data Accessed
sub1.content1: If you explicitly connect your Google account, YOUB may access and manage Google Calendar data via the Google Calendar API full scope, limited to the minimum necessary to provide calendar synchronization. This may include:
items: Calendar metadata (e.g., calendar ID and calendar name)

Calendar events (only event fields required for scheduling and synchronization), such as event title/summary, description, start time, end time, recurrence information (if applicable), and event updates
sub1.content2: YOUB does not access Google data such as emails, contacts, files/documents, or any other Google services unrelated to calendar scheduling.

sub2.title: 5.2 Data Usage
sub2.content: We use Google Calendar data only for the following purposes:
items: Export training sessions: Create or update planned training sessions from YOUB in your Google Calendar (so your training plan appears in your schedule).
Import schedule availability: Read existing calendar events to optimize training planning around your availability (e.g., work commitments, travel, appointments).
sub2.content2: We do not use Google Calendar data for advertising, profiling, market research, or resale.

sub3.title: 5.3 Data Storage, Retention, and Deletion
items: Google Calendar data is processed securely and stored only as long as necessary to provide the calendar integration features.
You can disconnect Google Calendar at any time. After disconnection, YOUB no longer accesses your Google Calendar data.
Any stored Google Calendar-related data is deleted upon account disconnection or upon your request, unless legal retention obligations apply.

sub4.title: 5.4 Data Sharing
sub4.content: YOUB does not sell, rent, or share Google user data with third parties. Google user data may be processed by our infrastructure providers strictly as needed to operate the service (e.g., secure cloud hosting), and only under appropriate contractual safeguards (e.g., data processing agreements) and in compliance with applicable law.

sub5.title: 5.5 User Control
sub5.content: You can control your Google Calendar connection in the following ways:
items: Revoke access at any time via your Google Account settings (Third-party access / OAuth permissions).
Disconnect Google Calendar within YOUB (if available in-app).

section6.title: 6. AI and Machine Learning
section6.content1: YOUB uses artificial intelligence and machine learning to provide personalized training insights and recommendations. This may include analyzing your connected wearable data, training history, and preferences to tailor guidance.
section6.content2: Important clarification: Google user data accessed via Google APIs (such as Google Calendar data) is not used to train, improve, or develop generalized AI or machine learning models. Google Calendar data is used only to provide the calendar synchronization and scheduling functionality for your account.

section7.title: 7. Use of External Processors
section7.content: YOUB uses Microsoft Azure (including Azure OpenAI Service) and related cloud infrastructure to process personal data and generate personalized insights. Microsoft acts as a data processor under GDPR-compliant agreements (e.g., Data Processing Agreement / DPA), ensuring that your data is processed securely and in compliance with GDPR.
section7.content2: We only use processors that provide appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data.

section8.title: 8. Data Retention Periods
section8.content: We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, including satisfying any legal, accounting, or reporting requirements. Typically, your data will be retained for as long as you use the app and for a reasonable period afterward in case you decide to use our services again. You may request deletion at any time (see Section 9).

section9.title: 9. Data Subject Rights
section9.content: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:
items: Right of Access: You can request access to your personal data.
Right to Erasure: You can request the deletion of your personal data.
Right to Rectification: You can request the correction of inaccurate or incomplete data.
Right to Object: You can object to the processing of your personal data.
Right to Restrict Processing: You can request the restriction of processing your personal data.
Right to Data Portability: You can request the transfer of your personal data to another controller.
section9.contact: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at felix{'@'}youb.app.

section10.title: 10. International Data Transfers
section10.content: We store and process personal data on GDPR-compliant infrastructure. Where data is processed by service providers, we ensure appropriate safeguards are in place (e.g., contractual protections, DPAs, and where applicable, EU Standard Contractual Clauses). We do not transfer your personal data outside the EU unless such safeguards are implemented and required by law.

section11.title: 11. Security Measures and Safeguards
section11.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure a level of security appropriate to the risk, including encryption, access controls, least-privilege access, and regular security assessments.

section12.title: 12. Right to Lodge a Complaint
section12.content: If you believe that we have not complied with GDPR, you have the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority, particularly in the Member State of your habitual residence, place of work, or place of the alleged infringement.

section13.title: 13. Contact for Privacy Inquiries
section13.content: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or your personal data, please contact us at:

privacyPolicy.consent: By using the YOUB app, you consent to the processing of your personal data as described in this Privacy Policy.
privacyPolicy.footer: This Privacy Policy is designed to be clear and accessible. If there are any terms you do not understand or if you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact us.
